channel.title: RSC Quest system discussion - split from the Agility topic
channel.description:
[quote="gawdz666, post:5, topic:248311"]if you look in the video i got a fully intergrated clan system working i dunno if it is worth releasing its like you make a clan saves it in [clan] format infront of your name there is a clan leader get all people who wish to join your clan whatnot
or should i next just make quests?
suggestions? im bored[/quote]
like xEnt's party system?
quests would be a +++

item.description:
@Argation wrote:

well ephemeral has axxess to some other accounts on rsc, so at one point most of the quests should get documented. gonna be a pain in the ass though!

item.source: RSC Quest system discussion - split from the Agility topic

item.title: RSC Quest system discussion - split from the Agility topic
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

I already tried to document little bit of quests in RSC earlier. I got almost the whole Romeo and Juliet quest done… I am lacking the part when you start talking to Juliet. But I think I got the whole part of when you start talking to Romeo. I went out of RSC-accounts to be able to document the part of Juliet. I have 3 RSC accounts.

So here is the quest (even spelling-mistakes are included as in RSC):

Options 1 [MENU M]: Yes, I have seen her No, but that's girls for you Can I help find her for you?

Options 2 [MENU M.1]:
Yes, I will tell her
Sorry, I am too busy. Maybe later?

Options 3 [MENU M.2]:
Yes, I will tell her how you feel
I can’t, it sounds like work to me

#1: Yes, I have seen her -> Yes, I will tell her -> START_QUEST
#2: Yes, I have seen her -> Sorry, I am too busy. Maybe later? -> END_QUEST
#3: No, but that’s girls for you -> Yes, I will tell her how you feel -> [?]START_QUEST[?]
#4: No, but that’s girls for you -> I can’t, it sounds like work to me -> END_QUEST
#5: Can I help find her for you? -> START_QUEST

START:

Romeo: Juliet, juliet, juliet! Wherefore are thou?
Romeo: Kind friend, have you seen juliet?
Romeo: Her and her father seem to have disappeared

#1 - [Yes, I have seen her] :: [Yes, I will tell her]:

You: Yes, i have seen her
You: I think it was her. Blond, stressed
Romeo: Yes, that sounds like her
Romeo: Please tell her i long to be with her

[OPTION 1 : Yes, I will tell her]

You: Yes, i will tell her how you feel
Romeo: You are the saviour of my heart, thank you.
You: Err, yes. Ok. Thats… Nice.

[QUEST STARTS]

#2 - [Yes, I have seen her] :: [Sorry, I am too busy. Maybe later?]:

You: Yes, i have seen her
You: I think it was her. Blond, stressed
Romeo: Yes, that sounds like her
Romeo: Please tell her i long to be with her

[OPTION 2 : Sorry, I am too busy. Maybe later?]

You: Sorry, i am too busy. Maybe later?
Romeo: Well if you do find her, i would be most grateful

[QUEST ENDS]

#3 - [No, but that’s girls for you] :: [Yes, I will tell her how you feel]:

You: No, but that’s girls for you
Romeo: Not my dear juliet. She is different
Romeo: Could you find her for me?
Romeo: Please tell her i long to be with her

[OPTION 1 : Yes, I will tell her how you feel]

You: Yes, i will tell her how you feel
[CONTINUATION YET UNKNOWN]

#4 - [No, but that’s girls for you] :: [I can’t, it sounds like work to me]:

You: No, but that’s girls for you
Romeo: Not my dear juliet. She is different
Romeo: Could you find her for me?
Romeo: Please tell her i long to be with her

[OPTION 2 : I can’t, it sounds like work to me]

You: I can’t, it sounds like work to me
Romeo: Well, i guess you are not the romantic type
Romeo: Goodbye

[QUEST ENDS]

#5 - [Can I help find her for you?]:

You: Can i help find her for you?
Romeo: Oh, would you? that would be wonderful!
Romeo: Please tell her i long to be with her
You: Yes, i will tell her how you feel
Romeo: You are the saviour of my heart, thank you.
You: Err, yes. Ok. Thats… Nice.

[QUEST STARTS]

At Romeo when quest just started:

Romeo: Please find my juliet. I am so, so sad

Talking to Juliet after quest started with Romeo:

You: Juliet, i come from romeo
You: He begs me tell you he cares still
Romeo: Please, take this message to him
You: Certinly, i will deliver your message straight away
Juliet: It may be our only hope

[Juliet gives you a message] :: Give InventoryItem with ID 56 (message)

IF(Talking to Juliet once again before delivering)
Juliet: Please, deliver the message to romeo with all speed

Talking to Romeo after previously talking to Juliet:

You: Romeo, i have a message from juliet

[You pass Juliet’s message to Romeo] :: Remove InventoryItem with ID 56 (message)

Romeo: Tragic news. Her father is opposing our marriage
Romeo: If her father sees me, he will kill me
Romeo: I dare not go near his lands
Romeo: She says father lawrence can help us
Romeo: Please find him for me. Tell him of our plight

IF(Talking to Romeo right away again)
Romeo: Please friend, how goes our quest?
Romeo: Father lawrence must be told. Only he can help

IF(Talking to Juliet right away)
You: I have passed on your message
You: Now i go to father lawrence for help
Juliet: Yes, he knows many things that can be done
Juliet: I hope you find him soon

Talking to Father Lawrence:

You: Romeo sent me. He says you can help
Father Lawrence: Ah romeo, yes. A fine lad, but a little bit confused
You: Juliet must be rescued from her fathers control
Father Lawrence: I know just the thing. A potion to make her appear dead
Father Lawrence: Then romeo can collect her from the crypt
Father Lawrence: Go to the apothecare, tell him i sent you
Father Lawrence: You need some cadava potion

IF(Talking to Father Lawrence right away)
Father Lawrence: Ah, have you found the apothecary yet?
Father Lawrence: Remember, cadava potion, for father lawrence

Talking to Apothecary:

You: Apothecary. Father lawrence sent me
You: I need some cadava potion to help romeo and juliet
Apothecary: Cadava potion. Its pretty nasty. And hard to make
Apothecary: Wing of rat, tail of from. Ear of snake and horn of dog
Apothecary: I have all that, but i need some cadavaberries
Apothecary: You will have to find them while i get the rest ready
Apothecary: Bring them here when you have them. But be careful. They are nasty

IF(Talking to him again without berries)
Apothecary: Keep searching for the berries
Apothecary: They are needed for the potion

IF(Talking to him while having berries)
Apothecary: Well done. You have the berries

[You hand over the berries] :: Remove ID for Cadavaberries
[Which the apothecary shakes up in vial of strange liquid]

Apothecary: Here is what you need

[The apothecary gives you a Cadava potion] :: Add InventoryItem 57 (Cadava)

IF(Talking to Romeo while having Cadava potion)
Romeo: Ah, you have the potion. I was told what to do by the good father
Romeo: Better get it to juliet. She knows what is happening

IF(Talking to Father Lawrence, should be done earlier, but doesn’t matter)
Father Lawrence: Did you find the apothecary?
You: Yes, i must find some berries
Father Lawrence: Well, take care. They are poisonous to the touch
Father Lawrence: You will need gloves
You: I am on my way back to him with the ingredients
Father Lawrence: Good work. Get the potion to juliet when you have it
Father Lawrence: I will tell romeo to be ready

IF(Talking to Juliet while having the Cadava potion)
You: I have a potion from father lawrence
You: It should make you seem dead, and get you away from this place

[You pss the potion to Juliet] :: Remove InventoryItem 57 (Cadava)

Juliet: Wonderful. I just hope romeo can remember to get me from the crypt
Juliet: Many thanks kind friend
Juliet: Please go to romeo, make sure he understands
Juliet: He can be a bit dense sometimes

IF(Talking to Juliet once again without going to Romeo)
Juliet: Have you seen romeo? he will reward you for your help
Juliet: He is the wealth in this story
Juliet: I am just the glamour

IF(Talking to Romeo again)
You: Romeo, its all set. Juliet has the potion
Romeo: Ah right
Romeo: What potion would that be then?
You: The one to get her to the crypt.
Romeo: Ah right
Romeo: So she is dead then. Ah thats a shame
Romeo: Thanks for your help anyway.

[You have completed the quest of Romeo and Juliet]
[@gre@You haved gained 5 quest points!]

IF(Talking to Romeo after quest finished)
Romeo: I heard juliet had died. Terrible business
Romeo: Her cousin and i are getting on well though
Romeo: Thanks for your help

IF(Talking to Juliet after quest finished)
Juliet: I sat in that cold crypt for ages waiting for romeo
Juliet: That useless fool never showed up
Juliet: And all i got was indigestion. I am done with men like him
Juliet: Now go away before i call my father!

IF(Talking to Father Lawrence before quest)
Father Lawrence: Hello adventurer, do you seek a quest?

Options {
I am always looking for a quest//1
No, I prefer just to kill things//2
Can you recommend a good bar?//3

1).
You: I am always looking for a quest
Father Lawrence: Well, i see poor romeo wandering around the square. I think he may nee[d help(?)]
Father Lawrence: I was helping him and juliet to meet, but it became impossible
Father Lawrence: I am sure he can use some help
END:
2).
You: No, i prefer just to kill things
Father Lawrence: That’s a fine career in these lands
Father Lawrence: There is more that needs killing every day
END:
3).
You: Can you recommend a good bar?
Father Lawrence: Drinking will be the death of you
Father Lawrence: But the blue moon in the city is cheap enough
Father Lawrence: And providing you buy one drink an hour they let you stay all night
}

IF(Talking to Father Lawrence after quest finished)
Father Lawrence: Oh to be a father in the times of whiskey
Father Lawrence: I sing and i drink and i wake up in gutters
Father Lawrence: Top of the morning to you
Father Lawrence: To err is human, to forgive, quite difficult

Read full topic
item.source: RSC Quest system discussion - split from the Agility topic

item.title: RSC Quest system discussion - split from the Agility topic
item.dc:creator: @xEnt xEnt
item.description:
@xEnt wrote:

[quote=“Peter, post:37, topic:248364”][quote author=Yz85Racer link=topic=327424.msg2565713#msg2565713 date=1228371961]

I think the biggest problem would be for bigger servers with a larger userbase - stability wise.

Looking forward to it gawdz

I don’t see why it should have any effect on performance at all.

His going to what everyone else is saying… But the reason why he “might” think its due to it when people are like

It will fail at 150 players because of the useless shit you are geting called all the time i.e the

eventHandler.add(new DelayedEvent(null, 900000) {  }

But in the quest system we may be using that for a npc delay chat but it want effect anythink if you just use a sleep instread of a delayed event or blah blah blah

So your suggestion is to thread the quests?

What the fuck would be the point of that?
[/quote]

That’s T_x, I want to see him explain his idea.[/quote]
No, he just figured why not use a Thread.sleep on the current thread quests run on. Instead of the delayed event. but that’s T_x for ya.

Read full topic
item.source: RSC Quest system discussion - split from the Agility topic

@dcshoes1 wrote:

[quote=“extacy, post:30, topic:248364”][quote author=dcshoes1 link=topic=327424.msg2565210#msg2565210 date=1228352743]

my status completely integrated server sided loading saving
95% client sided

5% left = the loading completed quests green or red from calling it

will be done and show progress soon

fastrer faster, want to see the progress

im currently buying a chara with 0 quest complete for real rsc, so i can record each quest to get all the text for every one, and every option
after i complete each one ill be more the happy to post it for others to use

but its great to see some development in the last few days
[/quote]Ive manged to get a lvl 120 with 30+ quests points msn me ill be there or watching a film

hai t_x[/quote]Hi sexy

item.source: RSC Quest system discussion - split from the Agility topic
